text:
Oura Health | Helsinki, Finland | Python Backend Developer | Onsite | https://ouraring.com

Oura ring is a smart ring that measures your sleep, activity, night-time body signals like HR, HRV and temperature. Oura app helps our users to improve their sleep and recovery.

Both Oura Ring and Oura App has won Red Dot Design Awards. We have passionate users that love our product and high-profile individual investors helping us.

We are looking for Python backend developers to strengthen our backend team. There are interesting challenges ranging from Data Engineering and Data Architecture and optimizing processing pipelines to machine learning and algorithm together with our science team.

Note: These positions are onsite in Helsinki, Finland only. We want to build the strong enough onsite team before extending to remote positions.

https://ouraring.com/careers/
